text: Risk: Asymptomatic patients with preserved LV function, even if severe AR, have little risk. Patients with symptoms or LV dysfunction need further evaluation. High HR: Maintain at 90 bpm to minimize diastole time, reducing regurgitant fraction. Low SVR: Maintain contractility and adequate volume loading. Maintain sinus rhythm and Conduct of Anaesthesia for AR - adequate diastolic pressure. \ No ahsolute contraindication: Any anesthetic technique may be used. Arterial Line and CVP: Consider for CHF to administer inotropes and vasodilators. Monitor for CHF postoperatively: Especially after large intraoperative fluid shifts. Made with QWhimsica]
